name: places/ChIJw9_feKVZwokRN3QFrguwX-g
formattedAddress: 210 5th Ave Suite 602, New York, NY 10010, USA
adrFormatAddress: 210 5th Ave Suite 602, New York, NY 10010, USA

editorialSummary.text: Storefront providing tailor-made suits & formalwear for men, plus accessories such as cufflinks.

originalText.text: I used Black Lapel for my wedding tuxedo and I am extremely happy with the custom Tuxedo they made for me. It came out exactly as I envisioned. Frank was the Black Lapel team member I worked with and he was extremely easy to work with and ensured that I got the product that fit me exactly as I desired well within the time frame I needed the tuxedo buy. If you’re looking for custom tuxes or suits, Black Lapel is the way to go!

text.text: I used Black Lapel for my wedding tuxedo and I am extremely happy with the custom Tuxedo they made for me. It came out exactly as I envisioned. Frank was the Black Lapel team member I worked with and he was extremely easy to work with and ensured that I got the product that fit me exactly as I desired well within the time frame I needed the tuxedo buy. If you’re looking for custom tuxes or suits, Black Lapel is the way to go!

originalText.text: Corey and I have gone back and forth to get a suit I ordered perfect. He offered a free remake and when the suit still didn’t fit right on my shoulders, he immediately followed up to hop on a call to see where the suit wasn’t working. He is extremely knowledgeable and knew exactly had to be done after just one quick call. I mailed my suit and when it returned it was perfect. I could not recommend Black Lapel any more. Don’t waste your time at suit supply or similar stores. Get a Black Lapel and they’ll get you right

originalText.text: I have always been a fan of Black Lapel because of the quality of their clothings. I recently returned and met Corey who assisted me with 2 custom suits and alterations on a 2 sports jackets & vests. The experience at their studio was classy, and professional. Corey is an expert at taking measurements and making the right suggestions when asked and given the context for the use of the garments you plan to wear. The turn around was quick, and most importantly, no additional alterations were needed when all the pieces returned for the fitting confirmation. Top experience, from start to finish!

text.text: I have always been a fan of Black Lapel because of the quality of their clothings. I recently returned and met Corey who assisted me with 2 custom suits and alterations on a 2 sports jackets & vests. The experience at their studio was classy, and professional. Corey is an expert at taking measurements and making the right suggestions when asked and given the context for the use of the garments you plan to wear. The turn around was quick, and most importantly, no additional alterations were needed when all the pieces returned for the fitting confirmation. Top experience, from start to finish!

originalText.text: As soon as you walk in, the atmosphere is professional. Suits everywhere, nice lighting, windows bringing in natural light to see the full beauty of the suits. Corey and the team are extremely professional, have immense knowledge, and taking measurements to perfection.  Any question you asked will be answered with clarity, and they are always willing to help. It was my first time purchasing a suit from there for a wedding, and from the first session to get fitted it was a great experience. The re-fittings have also been short and sweet, always having conversation and a laugh. If anyone is looking to buy suits for any occasion, Black Lapel is the place to go!

originalText.text:
This is definitely my new suit place! Corey is the man! After visiting a few shops in the area, I could tell Corey and the team here knew how to fit me for my wedding. The whole process was seamless from the start. The process began with an overview of our wedding, the style/colors we were going for, and my general preferences. Sizing was done immediately and meticulously. Having not had a lot of experience buying a custom-fitted suit in the past, Corey walked me through all my options and provide invaluable insight.

Once I got the suit, I was blown away. The craftsmanship was impeccable and I got tons of compliments on my wedding day. I cannot recommend Corey and The Black Lapel team enough for anyone looking for a bespoke suit!
